processing_structure.text: Clarify input and output (one integer input, sum of its divisors output)
Loop from 1 to the input value (for i = 1 to n)
Check if the number divides evenly (if n % i == 0)
If divisible, add it to the sum (sum = sum + i)

advice.text: You are in the coding stage; make sure your refined comments are fully translated into working statements and compile the program.
Double-check key expressions: loop bounds (i from 1 to n), the divisibility test (n % i == 0), and that sum starts at 0.
Now verify by running examples (e.g., n=6 should give 12, n=1 gives 1), test zero/negative inputs, and observe printed results to confirm correctness.
